import '../styles/ShowCard.css'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; // 👈 הוסיפי את זה function ShowCard({ showId,hallName,bandName, showDate, ticketPrice, picture, city, country, street }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); // 👈 יוצר פונקציית ניווט return (

{bandName}

{showDate}

{hallName || "Unknown Hall"}

{city && country && street ? `${country}, ${city}, ${street}` : "Unknown"}

{ticketPrice} ₪

); } export default ShowCard;
